channel.title: ICER Systems Blog
channel.description: This is ICER's systems announcements blog. We'll post information about systems downtimes, updates, new features, and other information for the ICER user community.

item.title: Welcome to the new ICER Systems Blog!
item.description: Hi! Welcome to the new ICER Systems Blog. Weâ€™ll have a RSS feed available soon. We also have a new user documentation site at https://msu-icer.github.io. Please let us know if you have any questions.
